page.title: 02The Yaxham Area
page.content:
In common with much of Norfolk the people of this area rely strongly on neighbouring towns for employment and services. However, apart from farming which directly or indirectly still provides work for quite a good number of people, there are numerous small businesses. Some of these will be described on page 9.
The life of the area is encouraged by participation both from those who have lived in the villages for generations, as well as the many people who make up the rapidly expanding Norfolk population of young and retired people.
